name: jQuery Easy FormMail
short_description:
<script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.10.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="EasyFormMail/jquery.easyFormMail.js"></script>
    <script>
        $(function(){
            $("#myForm").EasyFormMail({to:"recipient@example.com"});
        })
    </script> 
    <form id="myForm">
        <input class="required" name="input1" type="text"/>
        <input name="input2" type="text"/>
        <input name="input3" type="text"/>
        <textarea name="textarea1"></textarea>
        <input value="enviar" type="submit"/>
        <input value="reset" type="reset"/>
    </form>
summary: Create forms easily to send email with jQuery Easy FormMail plugin!
